title: Episode #66 - Cort McCown & ME
description: Actor, Comedian, & 90's heartthrob Cort McCown and I talk about the movies he has starred in, comedy, working with Playboy, his drug addiction & alcoholism, and getting clean.
content:encoded: Actor, Comedian, & 90's heartthrob Cort McCown and I talk about the movies he has starred in, comedy, working with Playboy, his drug addiction & alcoholism, and getting clean.
